hero.heading: MAX I & US
hero.desc: Maxius is the only self-developed semiconductor company that focuses on developing High-Performance Servers. We provide specialized solutions tailored towards different sectors of the IT industry and strive to break into the global market as a leader in server technology.
hero.footer: Together, we will be the best in value and speed.

explain.two: 2.Production and Sales of High- Performance Servers with self-manufactured semiconductors
explain.three: 3.Construction Blockchain IDC based on high-performance servers

desc.one: High-Performance Server with an extensive selection of serviceable capabilities Building IDC, incorporating the latest Storage technology applicable to various I/O devices various Blockchain Solutions, including IPFS.
desc.two: Maxius will continue to develop as a company in the global market by supplying a variety of products and solutions.

desc.one: Based on more than 20 years of research know-how and technology, we are the only company in Korea that makes HPC servers using self-developed system semiconductors and provides solutions specialized in the intelligent data center in the IT industry.
desc.two: With our services, Maxius strives to supply differentiated products and solutions.

desc.one: Maxius' miscellaneous products are used for AI/genetic analysis, edge computing, IDC centers, as well as various solutions used for vast data analysis, distributed processing functions and IPFS IDC, etc.
desc.two: Maxius will supply serviceable products and solutions to varying fields through R&D and communication.

desc.one: storage and service utilized in Metaverse IPFS Storage and Application Services in Web3.0
desc.two: Maxius provides both H/W and S/W, which are optimized for decentralized storage to match customer needs and create the best added value.
